description:
Turn your bike into a family vehicle. This light, smooth-rolling bike trailer holds 1 or 2 small passengers and has plenty of space for grocery runs or extended outings. Easy to fold, so you can store it when you're not riding or bring it along on the summer road trip.

  • Canopy is durable, polyurethane-coated polyester, with reflective trim for safety
  • Polyurethane front and side windows are UV protected so your kids get views without exposure
  • Front bug screen provides ventilation
  • Rain cover blocks the elements when needed
  • Harness system holds up to 2 passengers in security and comfort
  • ezHitch quick-release skewer replaces your bike's skewer or axle. (Additional skewers are available for outfitting other bikes.)
  • Hitch arm secures with a locking pick and safety strap to add safety
  • Ball-and-socket design allows bike and trailer to move independently on turns
  • Large storage compartments in the rear hold adventure gear or shopping
  • Mesh pocket in the interior for smaller items
  • Big 20in. wheels keep the ride smooth over cracks or bumps
  • Included reflectors and flag increase visibility and safety
  • Folded dimensions are 94 x 77 x 28cm
  • Maximum height of passenger(s):111cm
  • Passengers should wear a cycling helmet
  • Not recommended for child under 12 months
name: Thule Cadence 2 Child Trailer - Children
